source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a static shot from inside a car trunk, facing outward toward a large frosted window that fills most of the upper center of the frame, with the camera at the subject’s height. In the foreground, a blue storage bin with various items is positioned at the bottom left, and a brown rounded object is at the bottom right. A stack of black containers sits in the center foreground, just below the window. Initially, the person’s face is faintly visible through the left side of the frosted window, placing them in the background and top left of the frame. As the trunk opens, the person’s upper body moves into a medium shot, occupying the center and left middle ground, while the blue bin and brown object remain in the lower corners. The person places a bag into the trunk, with the bag briefly appearing in the center foreground. As the trunk closes, the person’s hand is visible at the top center foreground, pushing the lid down, while the rest of their body moves out of view. Throughout, the camera remains stationary, and the spatial arrangement shifts mainly due to the trunk opening and closing, which changes the visibility and prominence of the person and their hand within the frame.
